name: apiosk
description: Pay-per-request API access using USDC micropayments on Base. Proper Ethereum wallet with local key storage.
author: Olivier Brinkman
changelog: v1.1.0: Replaced Foundry (curl|bash) with ethers.js for wallet generation. Proper Ethereum keypair with local private key storage (chmod 600). No external installers required.

system.name: jq
system.install: brew install jq (macOS) or apt install jq (Linux)

steps: Fund wallet with USDC on Base (minimum $1-10 for testing)

notes: Private key stored locally in plaintext (chmod 600, owner-only)
Private key is never transmitted — only wallet address sent to gateway
No external installers required (no curl|bash) — uses ethers.js via npm
Only fund with small amounts for testing; use hardware wallet/KMS for production
